channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Big Picture: Joe Burrow’s Discontent Sets Up Bengals’ Most Important Offseason Ever
item.description: It's mostly been downhill since the Bengals' 2021 Super Bowl run, so how much longer should their star QB give them to figure it out?

item.title: 2025 NFL Week 16 Picks: Best Bets for Every Game — Will's Wagers
item.description: Will Hill delivers his best bet for EVERY NFL Week 16 matchup, beginning with the pivotal NFC West showdown between the Rams and Seahawks.

item.title: Is Lamar Jackson’s inability to stay healthy costing the Ravens? | First Things First
item.description: Lamar Jackson missed practice with “a flu like deal” ahead of the Baltimore Ravens’ matchup with the New England Patriots. Nick Wright, Chris Broussar...

item.title: Lamine Yamal vs. Lionel Messi: Finalissima Between Spain and Argentina Confirmed
item.description: A generational showdown is officially on the calendar as Spain and Argentina prepare to contest the Finalissima in Qatar, setting up a first-ever seni...

item.title: Remember When: Stu Holden and John Strong Relive the 2022 World Cup Final, 3 Years Later
item.description: FOX Sports' lead soccer analysts John Strong look back on the 2022 World Cup final between Argentina and France on its three-year anniversary.

item.title: Who will squeeze into the NFL playoffs? Let's simulate the rest of the season to find out
item.description: We used the ESPN Football Power Index's most likely simulation to project Weeks 16, 17 and 18.

item.title: Jet owned by ex-NASCAR driver Biffle crashes
item.description: A business jet registered to a company run by retired NASCAR driver Greg Biffle crashed Thursday with six people onboard, authorities said.

item.title: Nacua apologizes, 'had no idea' gesture offensive
item.description: Rams wide receiver Puka Nacua issued a statement apologizing for performing a gesture on an internet livestream that was "antisemitic in nature and pe...

item.title: Coveted head coaching jobs that might come open this offseason
item.description: Which opening would be most attractive? Let's sort eight possible openings, starting with Cincinnati.

item.title: WNBPA members vote to strike 'when necessary'
item.description: The WNBPA announced Thursday that its members have voted overwhelmingly to authorize calling a strike "when necessary" during the ongoing negotiations...
